DataElement.preferredDefinition: The end date of study treatment represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the end date or last date of administration of study treatment using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: If start date and end date are not expected to be on the same date, the end date is required. If the study design indicates that the start and end date are on the same day, the end date is not required since it can be assigned to be equal to the start date.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXENDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH END DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable EXENDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3028746 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
